metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3172 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A security issue was discovered in kube-apiserver that allows an aggregated API server to redirect client traffic to any URL.  This could  lead to the client performing unexpected actions as well as forwarding the client's API server credentials to third parties.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
